授業目的:
Enabling students' knowledge building and critical thinking on NGOs, particularly their developmental role in different socio-political context, as well as the developmental aspects, and global-local impacts of NGOs
Students can use the learning for organizing, and lead, NGOs/ NPOs activities in different settings of a globalizinging world.
到達目標:
Students can make critical analysis on NGOs, particularly their developmental role in different socio-political context, and can assess the impacts of NGOs.
Students can work effectively with NGOs activities as organizer, or better, demonstrating leadership, as well as policy analyst.
特記事項: 【合併】N.G.O.（総合政策学部）/非政府組織論（総合政策学部）
関連科目:
Other Courses taught by the Teacher ( O. K. LAI ) and LUNA Link; Teaching References Folders, or plus:
教材フォルダ Y-Drive for study: TOP y 三田 OK_LAI_Course_2023 NGOs_Studies_2023_
授業の概要・背景:
This Class is FACE-to-FACE Teaching but Might be ON Learning Folder, Details at the LUNA.
Students are expected to do research work beyond class-teaching - references
Please Check with the LUNA & Y-Drive TOP y 三田 OK_LAI_Course_2023 NGOs_Studies_2023_
授業方法:
Lecture by Teacher, Presentation by Students, Small Group Discussions & Debate in ENGLISH LUNA Link:
2 Reading Weeks - up to 4 classes (for Book & Project Review, with no Lecture)
2 Fieldwork Exercise (to be done by Students) and Reading Weeks when no lecture.

第15回:
The Final Report has TWO Parts: 1st Part (800-word x 2) and 2nd Part (4000-word)
1st Part: 2-Reviews: One Review for 2-Reference/Readings; Another One Review for 2-Videos/Youtube.
2nd Part: Answer the Questions (available later) in English 3500-word (14-page)
